data.text: Gallery for #MothersDay: selected photos from around the world over the years: http://bit.ly/lBunot @UN_Photo @Flickr
For the #UN & partners, every day is #MothersDay. Learn about the "Every woman, every child" initiative: http://bit.ly/a13KiX
Starting today in Geneva: Global Platform for Disaster Reduction http://bit.ly/iuaKdP #gpdrr2011 @UNISDR
Sunday: Take a moment to pay tribute to all victims of the Second World War http://bit.ly/mbQK7N #WWII
Climate change: project expected to reduce emissions of carbon dioxide reaches milestone http://bit.ly/mqCL0x #CDM
As populations rise, @UNFPA official stresses need for safe family planning options http://bit.ly/jb8tdl
#Bolivia: Four @UNODC staff & two pilots confirmed killed in plane crash http://bit.ly/mdO3aC #UN

World-renowned conductor & #UN Messenger of Peace Daniel Barenboim visited #Gaza this week. More: http://bit.ly/mq9bMT #MiddleEast
International community needs to rethink its emergency mental health relief.  Story from @WHOBulletin: http://bit.ly/l3yHKu
On #MothersDay, you can do something wonderful. A gift for a mom close to you, is a new life for a mom far away: http://bit.ly/lgYc28 @WFP
@MuscularLiberal Agreement was terminated (http://bit.ly/kBat0q) and she is also listed here as well: http://bit.ly/hEE8mF
@MuscularLiberal @JuliaRoberts 1.9 million people die each year from exposure to cookstove smoke.
.@JuliaRoberts brings attention to urgent health problem: deadly smoke from unsafe, inefficient cookstoves http://bit.ly/mTMWbu

Thanks for all the re-tweets and #followfriday mentions! Welcome to our new twitter followers!

@QueenClair @UNrightswire That process happens every 4 years & all member states are reviewed. Here is latest: http://bit.ly/hk2Vbk
@yourfreedomnews Sorry spammers are using the #UN name to contact you. Please see: http://www.un.org/en/aboutun/fraudalert/
@msefanov Some recent info: http://bit.ly/j8wd3f (SG) & http://bit.ly/j9YHof (Human Rights Council).

Equal rights for everyone whoever they love is a human rights cause supported by top #UN official. New video: http://bit.ly/iB0pku

@Under60 Thanks for your question. You can learn more here: http://bit.ly/jp840T
@LocalOdd1 Thanks for your question. Please see the latest documents on #Cuba embargo here: http://bit.ly/mdjAel

@msefanov Can you clarify your question? What do you mean by a release? Thanks for your interest!
